name: India Globalization Capital, Inc.
description: India Globalization Capital, Inc. (IGC) is an innovative company focused on the development of cannabis-based products for the treatment of various medical conditions. Established in 2005 and headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, IGC leverages its expertise in both the cannabis and pharmaceutical industries to create a diverse portfolio of products that address significant medical needs. The company is particularly focused on the therapeutic potential of cannabinoids, seeking to develop products that can alleviate symptoms associated with chronic pain, anxiety, and other health issues. IGC is also involved in the development of plant-based solutions that can enhance agricultural productivity. With a commitment to research and development, IGC is at the forefront of exploring the beneficial applications of cannabis in modern medicine. The company's mission is to provide high-quality, effective treatments that can improve patients' quality of life, while also contributing to the broader acceptance and understanding of cannabis as a legitimate therapeutic option. As legislation surrounding cannabis continues to evolve, IGC is strategically positioned to capitalize on emerging opportunities in the market, making it a key player in the healthcare and wellness sectors.

seo.meta_title: India Globalization Capital, Inc. | Cannabis-Based Healthcare Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore India Globalization Capital, Inc., a leader in cannabis-based therapeutic products. Discover our innovative solutions for chronic pain and other medical conditions.

faq.question: What products does IGC develop?
faq.answer: IGC develops cannabis-based products for medical treatments and agricultural solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of IGC?
faq.answer: Ram Mukunda is the CEO of India Globalization Capital, Inc.

faq.question: Where is IGC headquartered?
faq.answer: IGC is headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, USA.
